share on x michelle harrison. jun 14 at 3:42 pm lit a candle in memory of virginia castleberry. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x elizabeth castleberry. jun 14 at 3:35 pm sent a gift in memory of virginia castleberry. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x wc william earl castleberry. jun 14 at 1:21 pm lit a candle in memory of virginia castleberry. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x elizabeth castleberry. jun 14 at 11:13 am this verse helped my mother through the passing of her own mother. i wanted to share with you all, possibly to help ease your pain today. momma, you were thinking of us even before you left. it helps me to know you are "safely home" . i love you. ripsafely homei am home in heaven, dear ones; oh, so happy and so bright; there is perfect joy and beautyin this everlasting light. all the pain and grief is over, every restless tossing passed; i am now at peace forever, safely home in heaven at last. there is work still waiting for you, so you must not idly stand; do it now, while life remaineth--you shall rest in gods own land. when that work is all completed, he will gently call you home; oh, the rapture of that meeting, oh the joy to see you come! comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x elizabeth castleberry. jun 14 at 10:42 am 1 file added to the album new album name comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x em elaine castleberry morgan. jun 12 at 6:03 pm aunt ginner was one special lady. will miss her very much. love my georgia cousins very much. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... currently no events are scheduled. new album name wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe tim stewart funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
